positions.subtitle: RightAngle Global
positions.description: RightAngle is an Expert Network company that specializes in tailored knowledge solutions to complex business needs and pressing research objectives. Our main clients are Management Consulting firms, and our mission is to connect them to top industry professionals around the globe, helping them gain insight into a specific industry/market/segment.As an Associate, my responsibilities are:- Fulfilling time-sensitive research requests for the company's clients; analyzing client requests, qualifying topic experts, recommending experts profiles across industries such as Healthcare/Pharma, Financial Services, IT, Energy/Oil and Gas etc. - Assisting senior team members with high-level service fulfilment by managing products including virtual events (tele- and video-conference), Market and Custom Surveys, Talent shortlist, etc.- Developing a working knowledge of the area’s core industries to improve project and product service quality
positions.title: Associate, Client Solutions
positions.description_html:
RightAngle is an Expert Network company that specializes in tailored knowledge solutions to complex business needs and pressing research objectives. Our main clients are Management Consulting firms, and our mission is to connect them to top industry professionals around the globe, helping them gain insight into a specific industry/market/segment.

As an Associate, my responsibilities are:

- Fulfilling time-sensitive research requests for the company's clients; analyzing client requests, qualifying topic experts, recommending experts profiles across industries such as Healthcare/Pharma, Financial Services, IT, Energy/Oil and Gas etc.
- Assisting senior team members with high-level service fulfilment by managing products including virtual events (tele- and video-conference), Market and Custom Surveys, Talent shortlist, etc.
- Developing a working knowledge of the area’s core industries to improve project and product service quality

positions.subtitle: ISC
